location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 551A from William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain David Wilson, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: William Newnham writes in reference to his previous letter no. 542 of the same date regarding the affairs of Bushire and encloses for Wilson's information a copy of his letter no. 543 to the Colonel John MacDonald Kinneir, Envoy to the Court of Persia, on the same subject.
